Class ShoppingListViewController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g01.view.ViewController<ShoppingListViewController.Listener>
ulb.infof307.g01.view.shoppingList.ShoppingListViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateShoppingListViewController, ModifyShoppingListViewController
public abstract class ShoppingListViewController extends ViewController<ShoppingListViewController.Listener> implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Super Classe contenant les méthodes doublons qu'utilise la fenêtre creation/modif liste de courses
